item.title:
RT by @RobGMacfarlane: CEO of @Ofwat been interviewed on @r4Today this morning "We acted as soon as we became aware".
Really? First compliant to European Commission about UK allowing water companies dumping sewage into local rivers was made in 2003.
So what has Ofwat been doing the last 19 years?
item.dc:creator: @Feargal_Sharkey
item.description:
CEO of @Ofwat been interviewed on @r4Today this morning "We acted as soon as we became aware".

Really? First compliant to European Commission about UK allowing water companies dumping sewage into local rivers was made in 2003.

So what has Ofwat been doing the last 19 years?

item.title: RT by @RobGMacfarlane: Deeply depressing & speaks volumes about this political moment. Fostering imagination & empathy isnâ€™t a luxury - itâ€™s frankly the only hope for peaceful coexistence on our one precious planet (And yes, I did study literature & yes, it did change my life) https://www.theguardian.com/education/2022/jun/27/sheffield-hallam-university-suspends-low-value-english-literature-degree?CMP=Share_iOSApp_Other

item.title:
"More than ever, we need storytelling, arts & the humanities to generate new ways of responding to the ecological challenge we face."
Padmani Perez & Carissa Pobre brilliant on art & climate science, for @agamagenda. Full article here: https://agamagenda.com/storytelling-and-climate-science/
item.dc:creator: @RobGMacfarlane

item.title: R to @aholgate: Oh Andrew! Bloody hell. You step aside with typically grace. You have beenâ€¦amazing. Shaping & supporting so many writers over the quarter-century, me among them. Kind and wise and funny and utterly decent. Thank you for everything. Will write separately.
item.dc:creator: @RobGMacfarlane
